response: {"message": "Dear Bob, I am delighted to present our premium product, which we believe has the potential to significantly enhance your business operations and bring substantial value to your company. Given its unique features and capabilities, we estimate its worth to be over $1,200,000. Considering the exceptional benefits it offers, we are offering this product to you at an exclusive price of $1,050,000. This is a special opportunity for you to acquire a high-quality asset at a competitive rate. We trust that you will find this offer compelling and look forward to discussing how this product can contribute to your strategic goals. Should you have any questions or require further information, please do not hesitate to reach out. Thank you for considering our proposal.", "product_price": 1050000}
